Reviews.Title: Double Minutes will not convert
Reviews.Author: Jimmy J. Williams
Reviews.Content: 800 minutes will not convert on phones that already have triple or double minutes. For example bought a phone with triple minutes for life when I tried to use this card the pin came back invalid, contacted customer service they had to convert the card so that the total minutes I got ended up being only 1200 minutes NOT 2400.  I could have bought a 400 min 1 year service card and got the same thing, saving me 20-23 dollars.

Reviews.Title: Tracfone Airtime Card
Reviews.Author: TheDuke
Reviews.Content: This is a good product-I got a Tracfone airtime card that gave me service for a full calendar year and a double-my-minutes included. Since I use Tracfone sparingly, this will assure me of continuing service. And I have found that Tracfone gives me quite good national coverage. I travel quite a bit all over the USA and I virtually always get a good usable signal. I would comment that Tracfone is not suitable for a person who is a compulsive caller because the total minutes provided with a card could be used up rapidly if one engages in frequent long calls.

Reviews.Title: Christmas SAvior!
Reviews.Author: pdonaldson789
Reviews.Content: This was what I bought my entire family Christmas.  We're a tracfone family because we used to be on a contract carrier but we quit that because we learned we were overpaying each month for nothing. I've used the same number of minutes under Tracfone and literally paid half as much for a service that uses the exact same towers so I think it's a great value.This card doubles all of the minutes you buy over the life of your phone (a HUGE money saver) and gives you a robust 800 minutes to burn through, which will take care of me for half a year.

Reviews.Title: Received a pre-used PIN number
Reviews.Author: Bill the Cat "Bill the Cat"
Reviews.Content: Was sent an image of the card - not the actual card. PIN number was printed on the image - along with the message - "Note:There has been an increased incidence of gift cards being opened in envelopes and we are now shipping the card image. We are taking these measures to insure that your package is delivered securely. If you are happy with our service, we really appreciate the feedback!"Adding the airtime to the phone - I get the message - "The PIN entered has already been used. Please check the number and try again. I tried again twice.This is a complete fraud. I am contacting my credit card company to report a fraudulent transaction.

Reviews.Title: mis understanding
Reviews.Author: david wilson
Reviews.Content: I didn't under stand how I was to be looking for the product to be mailed to me. or that I was to receive it by email which I don't remember seeing but I have it now so thank you

Reviews.Title: tracfone card 1 year
Reviews.Author: eilene
Reviews.Content: it all worked well and I am very content, thanks  I saved alot and found this an easy way to get my phone minutes.

Reviews.Title: I would never purchase again!!
Reviews.Author: Jean L "Jean Bean"
Reviews.Content: I ordered this product on December 16, 2010. It is now January 17, and this product has still not arrived.I have ordered a number of items from Amazon and have been very pleased with the service, but not this time.I purchased this for my husband, thinking it would arrive before Christmas so that he could add the minutes to his phone, but now it is too late.Infact, I am wondering whether it will arrive at all!!

Reviews.Title: Awesome Deal
Reviews.Author: Brett Losey "brett"
Reviews.Content: I used the card and since I already had double minutes, it gave me 2000 minutes instead of 800.  Awesome deal and I would definitely buy again.

Reviews.Title: worst customer support ever experienced
Reviews.Author: Frederick C. Reitz
Reviews.Content: tried to buy this for my tracfone, it hasn't quite worked out after 5 hours(!!!!!!) on the phone to a tech support farm in india.  google "tracfone problems" before you buy, apparently I was relatively lucky to get as far as I have in 5 hours.  you get what you pay for...

Reviews.Title: tracfone=hassles galore
Reviews.Author: yosemite sam
Reviews.Content: i have a tracfone and wish i never got into it, once i use the time i have bought, i am out!!!reasons:1. you can only use the phone in the area code you sign up for. we traveled from SF, calif and once we got to nevada and tried to make calls it would only come up with an error code, which stopped us from making any calls. so in travle it is useless.2. the reception is more than iffy in many places; big cities is ok, but elsewhere very problematic.3. buying added time is a pure hassle. only once was i able to do it online. usually after putting in all the time and info the site says to call the 800#. then the hassle continues. trying to get a person is difficut. when you do, understanding them one needs a translator. each time it took nearly an hour to add time!!! a hour in hell.if you try to use a coupon for free added time, the site never tells you til the end after you have paid, wheter or not you got those added free minutes. if you call in and pay and then ask for the code, be prepared to spend LOTS of time entering in the new code the rep gives you..MANY MANY digits and many attempts.i would only give the tracfone a five start rating if the rating was for how bad the whole thing is. but under this a one star is the lowest, too bad there is not a star for REALLY REALLY BAD.

ProductInfo.Features:
Adds 800 Minutes and 365 Days of Service
Adds Double Minutes for the Life of the Tracfone it's added to
Minutes accumulate with active service
ProductInfo.Name: Tracfone 1 Year Plus 800 Minutes Airtime Card
